help.title: Tables to pass to R
help.short: The tables to make available to the R expression.

full.p: Only the tables listed here are available to the R expression. Table names are automatically adjusted to be valid R names if needed, and are listed below.

help.title: Packages to load in R
help.short: The packages to import for use in the R expression.

full.p: These packages will be imported (and installed, if needed) for you. List them here, separated by commas.

help.title: The R expression to run
help.short: The R code to run and turn into a table.

full.p: The R code can have multiple lines. The last line will be turned into a Columnal table.
If it's a data frame it will be turned into a full table. If it's a column or single value, it will be turned into a table with a single column.
R types will be converted to the most suitable Columnal types. Note that numbers in Columnal may be more precise than in R.
